page.title: 09BRISTOL A SCHOOL FAYRE
page.content: {COTHAM { {SS PETER AND PAUL SUMMER FAYRE} At the fayre we did a gymnastic display we did some forward rolls through hoops and neckspring off the box and a few other things.We did it outside in the playground on the mats There was another game where the Headmaster put his head through a hole and you could throw wet sponges at him which was good.Another game was the slippery pole.Two people sat on the pole an had to try hit each other off with a cushion if you fell off you fell onto some mats.
